deployProxyAndRefund(address,uint256,uin.details: Creates a new proxy with create 2, initializes the wallet and refunds the relayer.

preComputeAddress(address,address,bytes,.details: Precomputes the address of a proxy that is created through 'create2'.

proxyCreationCode().details: Allows to retrieve the creation code used for the Proxy deployment. With this it is easily possible to calculate predicted address.

proxyRuntimeCode().details: Allows to retrieve the runtime code of a deployed Proxy. This can be used to check that the expected Proxy was deployed.

userdoc.notice: Factory that creates new Laser proxies, and has helper methods.
